item.description:
I am co-hosting The Wedeln Ski & Snowboard Film Festival this Sunday in downtown Boston and we just confirmed a couple of additional snowboard films. This is sure to be a cool event and the location is ideal for showing films but keeping it a party.

The Wedeln Ski & Snowboard Film Festival
Date: Nov 23rd
Location: "The Place" , 2 Broad Street, Boston
Time: 7pm to 10pm
Cost: $15
free appetizers and many door prizes.
21+

Films include:
"Eastern Boarder"
"Blurred" by Huckfest
Poor Boyz Productions "Reasons!"
Rage Films "Such is Life"

I would hook you all up with free tickets but the proceeds are going to charity. $ from the film festival will go to the Peter Bragan Ski Race Scholarship. This scholarship helps several high School Ski Racer compete at the national level.

Pre-sale tickets are $10 but only available at the Wedeln Ski Club booth at the Ski Expo (booth e11) at Bayside Expo center this weekend or if you bump into me :). I will be there early, come by and say hello.

Several Meetups will be at the the film festival.
item.name: Ski and Snowboard Film Fest at "The Place"
